title: A Zoo's eye view: dawn to dark
creator_credit: James A. Oliver, Milan Herzog and Encyclopaedia Britannica Films
brief_description: Depicts the drama of a typical day at the San Diego Zoo. Shows the morning visitors, lively animals, an afternoon thunderstorm, and the quiet that returns as night draws near. Suitable for primary grades.
